MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA3 postcode area of Paisley. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:15am to locate a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:39am on the 16th of February 2021.
